akn:section.akn:heading: Improving the training of State, local, territorial, and tribal food safety officials

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Training The Secretary shall set standards and administer training and education programs for the employees of State, local, territorial, and tribal food safety officials relating to the regulatory responsibilities and policies established by this chapter, including programs for—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Partnerships with State and local officials

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Partnerships with State and local officials

(c) Extension service The Secretary shall ensure coordination with the extension activities of the National Institute of Food and Agriculture of the Department of Agriculture in advising producers and small processors transitioning into new practices required as a result of the enactment of the FDA Food Safety Modernization Act and assisting regulated industry with compliance with such Act.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: National Food Safety Training, Education, Extension, Outreach and Technical Assistance Program

akn:content.akn:p: (d) National Food Safety Training, Education, Extension, Outreach and Technical Assistance Program
(e) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out this section for fiscal years 2011 through 2015.
